recipe.title: Slow-Cooked Bell Peppers with Bay Leaves and Oregano
ingredients: 1 lb. any color bell peppers, halved, seeds and ribs removed
instructions: Place a rack in middle of oven and preheat to 350°F. Toss bell peppers, garlic, oregano, bay leaves, oil, and salt in a shallow 2-qt. baking dish to combine. Turn garlic cut side down, then roast vegetables, tossing 2 or 3 times, until golden brown, very tender, and edges are crisp, 80–90 minutes. Let cool slightly, then add vinegar and toss to coat.
